mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_NOTE_REMINDER reminder where reminder.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTE_REMINDER reminder ( reminder.ID, reminder.REMIND_TYPE, reminder.REMIND_DATE, reminder.IS_REPEAT, reminder.REMIND_CONTENT, reminder.BEFORE_DAYS, reminder.REMIND_TIME, reminder.IS_BEFORE, reminder.CREATETIME, reminder.UPDATETIME, reminder.CREATOR, reminder.CALENDAR_TYPE, reminder.HOLIDAY_TYPE ) VALUES( #{id:VARCHAR}, #{remind_type:NUMERIC}, #{remind_date:VARCHAR}, #{is_repeat:NUMERIC}, #{remind_content:VARCHAR}, #{before_days:NUMERIC}, #{remind_time:VARCHAR}, #{is_before:NUMERIC}, sysdate, sysdate, #{creator:VARCHAR}, #{calendar_type:NUMERIC}, #{holiday_type:NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTE_REMINDER reminder SET reminder.REMIND_TYPE = #{remind_type:NUMERIC}, reminder.REMIND_DATE = #{remind_date:VARCHAR}, reminder.IS_REPEAT = #{is_repeat:NUMERIC}, reminder.REMIND_CONTENT = #{remind_content:VARCHAR}, reminder.BEFORE_DAYS = #{before_days:NUMERIC}, reminder.REMIND_TIME = #{remind_time:VARCHAR}, reminder.IS_BEFORE = #{is_before:NUMERIC}, reminder.UPDATETIME = sysdate, reminder.CALENDAR_TYPE = #{calendar_type:NUMERIC}, reminder.HOLIDAY_TYPE=#{holiday_type:NUMERIC} WHERE reminder.ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_NOTE_REMINDER reminder WHERE reminder.ID=#{id}

select t.*, wu.openid, wu.nickname, wu.accountid from tb_note_reminder t join tb_user su on t.creator = su.userid join tb_wx_user wu on su.openid = wu.openid adn su.accountid=wu.accountid where t.needflag = 1 and ((substr(t.remind_date, 6) = #{yangliMMDD:VARCHAR} and t.remind_type= 0) or (t.remind_type = 1 and (substr(t.remind_date, 6) = #{yangliMMDD:VARCHAR} or substr(t.remind_date, 6) = #{noliMMDD:VARCHAR})) or (t.is_before = 1 and (to_char(to_date('${yearStr}'|| substr(t.remind_date, 5), 'yyyy-MM-dd') - t.before_days,'MM-dd')=#{yangliMMDD:VARCHAR} or to_char(to_date('${yearStr}'|| substr(t.remind_date, 5), 'yyyy-MM-dd') - t.before_days,'MM-dd') =#{noliMMDD:VARCHAR})))
